summary: Chichén Itzá was a huge ancient city built by the Maya people in Mexico. It was an important place in the Maya world from around 600 to 1200 AD. The city has many different types of buildings, showing a mix of Maya and other Mexican styles. This mix might be because people from different places lived there. Today, it is a popular tourist spot, with over 2.6 million visitors in 2017. The site is looked after by Mexico's National Institute of Anthropology and History.
title: Chichen Itza
